txt.en: 'Welcome to Bazanmanar, friend. In ancient days, this area would have been a bustling marketplace. Tables and crates piled high, full of goods grown in the tiers below. From here, you can see much of the gap, and just north of here lies a tunnel which would allow outside visitors into the mountain to shop for wares.\n\n'The records speak of a grand, open-air museum, full of gems, precious metals, and stone gathered across Gundabad. All I could uncover is that it lies north of here, \qabove the river, where the gems might glitter in the light of the sun's rays.\q Well, good luck, friend!'
Rocks on display! This must be Tharrkirîn!
An ancient Troll, turned to stone.
A cluster of large, pale crystals.
Gerja is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should let Gerja know what you found in Tharrkirîn.
An ancient troll, turned to stone
A cluster of large, pale crystals

'You found Tharrkirîn?'

You tell Gerja about the empty pedestal.

'I wonder what had been on display there. I fear anything of value will have been plundered long ago, alas.'
High above the River Kurdushâlak an ancient collection of stone from across Gundabad waits to be discovered.
Tharrkirîn is in northern Clovengap.\n\nYou have found Tharrkirîn, a plateau with stone-topped display platforms. You should explore the museum.
Tharrkirîn is in northern Gundabad.\n\nGerja has asked you to discover Tharrkirîn.
